Author
Name
Description

title: Add study details page to about:studies
body:
The [study listing](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/issues/751) links to details pages for individual studies. This issue covers implementing that page.

The page should be visually similar to the existing add-on detail page in about:addons, with the following changes:

- The page should have no search box or settings gear.
- There should be no control for automatic updates. The desired metadata to display is:
  - Icon
  - Author
  - Name
  - Description
- Studies do not (at least initially) support custom preference controls in the listing.
- Only the "Remove" button should remain for leaving studies.

@MattGrimes Do we have final copy for this page? Specifically the "Remove" button, in case we want to use a different string.
